headline.main: Britain and France to Begin Work on Wall Near Calais to Keep Migrants From Channel Tunnel

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Awaiting chances to reach Britain, thousands have converged on a sprawling, informal camp near the French port city that serves as a gateway to Britain via the Channel Tunnel....
lead_paragraph: Awaiting chances to reach Britain, thousands have converged on a sprawling, informal camp near the French port city that serves as a gateway to Britain via the Channel Tunnel.
